page.title: 17Lawshall-Diary 9yr old Boy.
page.content: Daniel aged 9yrs 4mths. Saturday. I got up at 8.15, washed,dressed and ate my breakfast of scrambled egg on toast and a cup of tea. Dad took me to the Den to meet Akela and the other Cub Scouts for Sports Day. I'm in Green Six First we had heats for 75metre sprint, I won my heat and went on to win the finals.Next was the Sargeant Jump-I got 7 points for that. Then we were put into 3's for the Sack Relay Race-we only came 4th but it was great fun, we kept falling over. My friend Phillip won the Throwing the Cricket Ball(over 30 metres).After a break for lunch we started the high jump.Then came the 50 metre Sprint against the clock I took 8.2 seconds-and got the full 10 points. In the Tug-of-War we got to the semi- finals.Lastly the presentation and I had won my Athlete's Badge Stages I &II What a great day it had been!
